text: Onofrio de Ponte (died 1676) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano (1650–1676). ==Biography== On 22 August 1650, Onofrio de Ponte was appointed during the papacy of Pope Innocent X as Bishop of Lettere- Gragnano. He served as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano until his death on 13 May 1676. ==References== ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:17th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Innocent X Category:1676 deaths
title: Onofrio de Ponte
